src_text: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
ref_text: La Cina antìca la ghera üna manéra ünica de mustrà divérs period de témp; ogni fàs cinés o ogni faméja al podé la ghera üna dinastìa distintìva.
hyp_text: La China antica aveva un modo unico di mostrare diversi periodi di tempo; ogni fase della Cina o ogni famiglia che era in potere era un dinastia distintiva.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: Ancient China had a unique way of showing different time periods; each stage of China or each family that was in power was a distinctive dynasty.
[Lombard]:

src_text: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
ref_text: Anca tra ogni dinastìa ghera ün mumént instàbil de pruvinci dividuu. El püssé cognossü di sti periòdi l’era l’epòca di Tri Régn che l’era dürada 60 ann tra la dinastìa Han e quéla Jin.
hyp_text: [Lombard]: Anca entre cada dinastia era un'eta instabile de provincias divididas. La plue conociata de iste epochas era le Epochas del Tres Regnos, durante 60 annos entre le Dinastia Han e le Dinastia Jin.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: Also between each dynasty was an unstable age of divided provinces. The best-known of these periods was the Three Kingdoms epoch taking place for 60 years between the Han and the Jin Dynasty.
[Lombard]:

src_text: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
ref_text: Dént sti periòdi gheren guèr aghér tra i tànt nòbil che i lutàven per el tròno.
hyp_text: Durante questi periodi s’è svolto un aspro scontro tra molti nobili che combattevano per il trono.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: During these periods fierce warfare took place between many nobles fighting for the throne.
[Lombard]:

src_text: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
ref_text: I Tri Règn ieren staa vün di epòch püssé sanguinusi in te la storìa de la Cina antìca, miaia de gént ieren mòrt in tel cumbàt per vèch el ségio püssé vòlt al grand palàzz de Xi’an.
hyp_text: Els Tres Regnes fou un dels períodes més sagnants de la història d’antiga Xina, milers de persones van morir lluitant per ocupar el lloc més alt al palau de Xi’an.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: The Three Kingdoms was one of the bloodiest eras in Ancient China’s history thousands of people died fighting to sit in the highest seat in the grand palace at Xi’an.
[Lombard]:

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

hyp_text: Tecnologicismo deterministico è un termine che comprende una vasta gamma di idee in pratica, dal push tecnologico o dal tecnologico imperativo a una stretta sensazione che il destino umano è guidato da una logica sottostante associata alle leggi scientifiche e la loro manifestazione in tecnologia.

src_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
ref_text: Si en parla de determinismo tecnològico en g’ha düü grand pensèè: vün qe el svilùp tecnològico và mia drèè dumò a la coltùra e a la pulitica, e l’olter qe la tecnologìa l’è mia cundiziunàda da la societàà ma la se manifèsta dènt a ésa.
hyp_text: Tutti i principali interpreti del determinismo tecnologico condividono due idee generali: che lo sviluppo della tecnologia stesso segue un percorso in gran parte al di fuori dell'influenza culturale o politica, e che la tecnologia a sua volta ha "effetti" sulle società che sono innate, piuttosto che socialmente condizionati.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is agriculture carried out for the production of enough food to meet just the needs of the agriculturalist and his/her family.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.

hyp_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.

[Lombard]:

src_text: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!

hyp_text: L’idea de ski è vëddeja — i pëintadörs de cav e che lëgnë sciëdurë da 5000 BC!

Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC!
[Lombard]:

src_text: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
ref_text: El scì alpìn cuma spòrt el và indree almenu al 17esim secùl, e in tel 1861 l’era sta dervii di norvegiés in Australia el prìm ski club ricreatìf.
hyp_text: Skijar de sport in giù dal pendìl almanco al 17° secolo, e al 1861 al primm club sportìv per skijar al stà australià al primm al mond.
prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia.
[Lombard]:

src_text: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking.
ref_text: Backpacking cunt i scì: chésta atività l’è anca ciamada föra pìsta, sci türistich o sci alpinìsmo.
hyp_text: Backpacking by ski: Questa attività si chiama anche backcountry ski, ski touring o ski hiking.

src_text: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
ref_text: L’è ligaa al sci türistich in stìl alpìn o ai scalàdi, ma de solit el necessita mia de fài, e chestì dù ienn fa in terén rìpid cunt el bisùgn de scì e scarpùn püssé düür.
hyp_text: A l'è 'l dì che gh'è relasiun ma minga sempre minga 'l invòlva l'alpinism sciistic o l'alpinism sciistic de montagna, ch'la vémm a cà del montagn che la se fa in di terren stes e la gh'ha bisògn de sci e scarponi minga pussee mòbi.

Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots.
[Lombard]:

ref_text: Pènsa al percùrs de scì cuma se fùss un percùrs simìl de trekking.
hyp_text: Pensèl de la via de scià de un via de caminà in general.

ref_text: In bùn condiziùn te reussirà a percùrr distànzi püssé gràndi del caminà - ma dumò de ràr te ciaperà la velocità del scì de fùnd senza un ruzàch pesànt sü pìsti batüdi.
hyp_text: In bon conditions tei tei puessi covri un pocch pusse grandis distanzes che camminà – ma solmen a pocchissimis ocasions tei tei puessi avè i velucitaa de scià de camp in piste bonìss.

src_text: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times.
ref_text: L’Euròpa l’è un continént che l’è pütòst picùl ma cunt parècc paés indipendént. In situaziùn nurmai, viagià travèrs püssé paés el vöraress dì fà dumànda de vìsto e fà i cuntròll di passapòrt parécc vòlt.

src_text: As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again.
ref_text: Fin a quand te rèstet dént chésta zona, in generàl te pòdet traversà i cunfìn senza passà amò travérs el bànch del cuntròll di passapòrt.

src_text: Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.
ref_text: In manéra simila, cunt un vìsto Schengen te ghe mia de fà dumanda de vìsto separàda per ogni staa member Schengen, donca el fà risparmià témp, danéé e scartòfi.

src_text: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
ref_text: Ghè mia üna definiziùn üniversàl per la qual i ogét indüstriai i se definissen d’antiquariaa. Quai agenzia fiscàl la definìss ogét de antiquariaa quei ogét chi ghann püssé de 100 ann.

Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: There is no universal definition for which manufactured items are antiques. Some tax agencies define goods older than 100 years as antiques.
[Lombard]:

src_text: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
ref_text: La definiziùn la ghà variaziùn geugrafich, indùa el lìmit d’età el podarès vès püssé bàs in pòst cuma el Nòrd Amerìca rispèt a l’Euròpa.

prompt:
Translate the following sentence from English to Lombard
[English]: The definition has geographic variations, where the age limit might be shorter in places such as North America than in Europe.
[Lombard]:
